Lachrimæ lachrimarum. or The distillation of teares shede for the vntymely death of the incomparable prince Panaretus. by Iosuah Syluester Sylvester, Josuah, 1563-1618. Quin, Walter.
[32] p. : ill. (woodcuts)
Printed by Humfrey Lownes, [London : 1612]
Panaretus = Prince Henry Frederick. In verse. Includes poems in English, French, Latin, and Italian by Walter Quin. Title is xylographic (white-line). Imprint from colophon, which is printed in a border of woodcuts on D4r. Sheets A and B are often mixed with other editions, or may exist in reimpositions which have not yet been adequately studied. Signatures: A-D⁴. Text printed on rectos only; versos are mourning pages. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
Lachrimæ lachrimarum. or The distillation of teares shede for the vntymely death of the incomparable prince Panaretus. by Iosuah Syluester Sylvester, Josuah, 1563-1618. Quin, Walter.
[32] p. : ill. (woodcuts)
Printed by Humfrey Lownes, [London : 1612]
Panaretus = Prince Henry Frederick. In verse. Includes poems in English, French, Latin, and Italian by Walter Quin. Title is xylographic (white-line). Imprint from colophon, which is printed in a border of woodcuts on D4r. Sheets A and B are often mixed with other editions, or may exist in reimpositions which have not yet been adequately studied. Signatures: A-D⁴. Text printed on rectos only; versos are mourning pages. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Humfrey Lownes
